input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOULOUSE METROPOLE. Summary: 25Mc0470Aoo - Supply of Metallurgical Products Years 2026 to 2030 this Consultation Mainly Concerns the Purchase of Metallurgical Products for the Ateliers Parc Automobile Area. Cepe. Description: The procurement procedure used is: open call for tenders. It is subject to the provisions of articles L. 2124-2, R. 2124-2 1° and R. 2161-2 to R. 2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. The framework agreement with maximum is concluded in application of the articles L2125-1 1°, R. 2162-1 to R. 2162-6, R. 2162-13 and R. 2162-14 of the Public Procurement Code. It will result in the issuance of purchase orders. This consultation is carried out within the framework of a grouping of orders in accordance with articles L. 2113-6 to L. 2113-8 of the Public Procurement Code with the following organizations: - Municipality of TOULOUSE The maximum annual amount of services in euros excluding tax for the initial period is as follows: Toulouse metropolis: 300,000.00 euro(s) excluding tax / Annual Municipality of Toulouse: 150,000.00 euro(s) excluding tax / Annual The amounts will be identical for each renewal period. The number of renewal periods is set at 3. As an indication, the estimated annual expenditure amounts to 250,000.00 euro(s) excluding tax. Published Date: 2025-12-27. Closing Date: 2026-01-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CITY OF THIONVILLE. Summary: Supply of Sands, Gravels, Shales, Dairy, Gravel. Description: The framework agreement is concluded from 01/01/2026 for 4 years, until 12/31/2029. The framework agreement with minimum and maximum will be executed by the issue of order orders. Lot 1: sand, gravel, gravel Lot 2: shale, limestone lot 3: dairy each lot will be the subject of a separate attribution. The services are paid by unit prices. A discount will be applied for services not provided for in the unit price slip. The prices can be revisable annually under the planned conditions of the framework agreement. Terms of settlement of accounts according to the CCAG-FCS. No clause of planned financial guarantee. No advance will be paid. Payment of services will be made in compliance with the overall payment period applicable to the buyer, or 30 days. Published Date: 2025-07-22. Closing Date: 2025-09-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Supply of Sands, Gravels, Shales, Dairy, Gravel

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: RATP. Summary: Framework Agreement on the Distribution of Tools. Description: The purpose of this notice is the supplies and the delivery of tools for the RATP group.<br> As part of this consultation, the RATP EPIC and CAP IDF constituted a group of orders for which the RATP was appointed coordinator.<br> The consultation is divided into 3 separate lots:<br> Batch 1 - Supply and abrasive tool supply and delivery,<br> Lot 2 - Supply and delivery of hand tools,<br> Lot 3 - Supply and delivery of electroportative tools,<br> Future markets are framework agreements with purchase orders without a minimum amount and with a maximum amount.<br> The sites of Deliveries are multiple in Ile de France (RATP attachment), and centralized (logistics platform of Boissy Saint Leger).<br> The purpose of this notice is to set up a frame, mono-attribute framework agreement, without minimum amount and with a maximum amount estimated at +30% of the median amount, For a period of 4 years, having the purpose of the supply and delivery of cutting and abrasive tools for the RATP group.<br> Some examples of products: abrasive band, diamond disc, ribbon saw, forests, blades, wicks.<br> As an indication, the price slip has approximately 212 references for a quantity entered which represents 85% of the estimated consumption<br> The purpose of this notice is to set up a framework, mono-attribute framework agreement, without a minimum amount and with a maximum amount estimated at +30% of the median amount, for a period of 4 years, having for object F.... Published Date: 2025-07-08. Closing Date: 2025-07-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: HIGHWAYS IN THE SOUTH OF FRANCE (ASF). Summary: A11 Stable La Frow/Corze Section - Road Maintenance. Description: The maintenance work on roads on the A11 STABLE/CORZE - PK 215-245 motorway include:<br> -The preparatory work of the front support recharging the road,<br> -The realization of road purges<br> -The repair of the section bearing layers<br> -The replacement of seals pavement<br> -The realization of the horizontal signaling before restoration,<br> -The supply, installation and removal of vertical signaling for closings of the exchangers<br> The attention of candidates is drawn to the fact that the execution of the work as a title this consultation may Take place simultaneously with other road sites whose consultations will be launched soon. Consequently, candidates will be expected to mobilize distinct human and material resources in the event of the award of several markets.<br> A11 STABLE LA FROW/CORZE section - Road maintenance<br> The following quantities are given as an indication:<br> - planing: about 660,000 m2<br> - Rolling BBSG: approximately 95,000 t<br> - Horizontal signaling: 34,000 ml of 2*2 lanes<br> - Replacement joints art structures : 50 ml<br> Doc Title: A11 Section Sable la Fleche/Corze - Maintenance of roads<br> Type contract: Works. Published Date: 2025-07-07. Closing Date: 2025-08-07. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
